website_summaries.verdict: Other than its cost, the Samsung Portable SSD T1 is what any portable drive should be.
pros: The Samsung Portable SSD T1 is tiny yet super-fast
The drive has up to 1TB of storage space, supports data encryption and works with both Mac and Windows
cons: The drive is expensive and has only a three-year warranty

customer_reviews.title: Great for editing 4K
customer_reviews.text: For the full crispy 4K video review search on youtube for "Edit 4k on external ssd" The 128GB Macbook Pro 2015 can Edit 4K content, however, it just does not have enough storage space. Fortunately there is a fast enough external SSD that can help. The Samsung T1 USB 3.0 comes in 250GB, 500GB, and 1TB capacities. With a Benchmark of 400 MBps read and write, you can edit 4K at home and on the go
customer_reviews.author: Cars and Tech by JDM City

customer_reviews.title: When I received this 250 GB drive and opened it ...
customer_reviews.text: When I received this 250 GB drive and opened it, the total space was 130 MB, then I clicked on the .exe file that was included and now it has the 250 GB. Interesting concept because in all my years of using file storage systems, software was not the was access to the storage. Either the storage was there or it was not. So........I am thinking that actually it is using some kind of compression to expand the storage amount. Compression slows processes down. End the end, the transfer speed from my "C" Drive to this back up seems to be the same as a SATA drive. I was hoping for much faster transfer rates.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great iPod classic replacement for my car!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Samsung T1 256gb SSD to replace my old 160gb iPod classic in my car. I was concerned after reading a few reviews that it wouldn't work. I am so happy with this product. It works great like a super sized thumb drive. It allows for fast access and the will allow the playing of music, photos and videos on my car audio system. It does require that you format it in FAT32 for use in the car but once formatted it works great. I will likely get another for my other car.
customer_reviews.author: M C

customer_reviews.title: Fast Drive with Built in Encryption
customer_reviews.text: Light and portable with built in encryption, this is great for corporate type stuff. It should be noted that to encrypt/descrypt the drive you'll need to use drivers/software provided by Samsung. I've got several VMs running directly off of this with Paralells and the speed is great. Really good drive.The only downside is it's a bit awkward hanging off a laptop with the small cable. I'd either like a direct connection or a longer cable so I could mount it a bit out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Puleo

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality & Speed From These Drives
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased two of these for each MacBook we have in the family. They read/write very quickly, making backups of files a rapid task. I have had no problems with the unit. It does come with a SHORT USB 3 cable, but just hooking to a laptop you do not need a longer cord. One of these years, they will be much larger capacity, with a good price and I would buy more, but for now the size is adequate for what I store on laptops. I reformatted with MacOS and encryption, but this was an easy process done with system software.
customer_reviews.author: Meyers Family

customer_reviews.title: Small, light and FAST! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and use a Macbook Pro w/only 256 of internal SSD. Because I write music I needed more room for my sample libraries and that storage needed to be FAST. I was a bit hesitant to order this product wondering if Samsung was somehow going to 'pull a fast one' on me (I seriously wondered if they'd hidden a regular SD card in a fancy little case). MAN, was I surprised! This thing is EXTREMELY LIGHT yet AMAZINGLY FAST! My sample libraries load from this SSD almost instantly. My only regret is that I didn't 'pony up' for the 500GB version!
customer_reviews.author: Zoda

customer_reviews.title: i like the encryption
customer_reviews.text: samsung got it right with this. haven't failed me yet. very fast. i like the encryption. hope it is really secure as they claim. you never really know as you always hear about hacks. great for travel. small, light, high capacity. more shock resistant than a traditional hard drive. with the usb 3.0, i can also use it as a dedicated external photoshop scratch disk.
customer_reviews.author: tmbrbeest

customer_reviews.title: Nice SSD, resonably priced. Great service.
customer_reviews.text: I received the Samsung External SSD when promised and it arrived appropriately packaged. I initially had difficulty getting my laptop to recognize the SSD, so I contacted seller. I received a response much sooner than I expected and the problem was resolved. Basically my lack of knowledge of the new Windows 10 OS. The External hard drive is working great and I would highly recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: CPORetired

customer_reviews.title: Get this!
customer_reviews.text: Way beyond my expectations! I had a video job that was running up to 5 cameras, at one point, and for three shows, and needed something to store all the files when done and use for editing. No so much as a hiccup from this tiny little drive. I even filled it to about 240+-Gb and still no issues. read write speeds were on par as stated. Get it! It's so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Frank_the_Tank

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Great little gizmo. Super light. Great material and craftsmanship. The total available disk space is 232GB. The encryption is AES 256 bit. It's very easy to set up the pass code and change it if needed using the native 'Samsung Portable SSD' application. Great as additional storage drive or a back up drive.
customer_reviews.author: ION

customer_reviews.title: Fast read/write; included cable is short.
customer_reviews.text: Used with my MacBook (2015) and the read/write speeds are very good. Honestly, I can't tell a difference in performance between this and my internal SSD. Small form factor, which is nice. Be forewarned that the included connection cable is quite short (probably 10-15 cm). That might be good or bad, depending on your needs.
customer_reviews.author: mregisterga

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Based on a recommendation by our local computer repair shop they experienced great results with SSD drives, we did our research and found this to be our best fit for modifying info while working in the information on the drive. Most don't know that an external drive should be for backup only not to work/ modify the information on the drive. With SSD we don't have to worry about that. It is very portable which is nice. The only negative is the cable but we have Samsung S5 smartphones which use the same cable. Most if not all 3.0 usb use this cable. Great find, thank you Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Wood

customer_reviews.title: Stay away.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Required samsung install to access it. Makes it useless to pass data around to multiple computers. Mac OS disk utility cannot format it. Connection problems from the first connection. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Mellan

customer_reviews.title: Talk about fast! Never did a backup in such a short time.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with an all SSD MacBook Pro and I was really afraid the hard drive wouldn't be big enough to take care of my needs. But I'm finding it is doing just fine and this makes a speedy back up drive to hold a clone of my machine. Not what I bought it for, but the speed blows me away.
customer_reviews.author: J. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: The cable is perfect and because of the very light case
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well designed drive. The cable is perfect and because of the very light case, will actually support the drive vertically if it is allowed to 'lean' against the back of the monitor. The transfer rate is easily noticeable as much faster than standard drives. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: 3DayPriest

customer_reviews.title: Great small size. Shop carefully
customer_reviews.text: Read all reviews before buying (I returned mine). Great size but you must know what you are buying here. Not easily formatted in mac systems unless you have experience with its format. Buy Samsung Evo products for a better mac experience.
customer_reviews.author: bjornga

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product!
customer_reviews.text: It's fast; it's effective; and it offers encryption! There is no backup software with this external SSD, which I LOVE. I was afraid that it would be one of those cheap drives with no other way to use it but software, but it functions just like a USB stick, but it's larger and faster. It also offers software that allows you to encrypt the drive completely.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: its super small so be careful with losing it
customer_reviews.text: This software that needs to be installed is a huge hassle. There are other comments that describe how to remove it, which is why it has 4 stars instead of 3. Besides that, its super small so be careful with losing it. The USB cord that comes with it fits the new Samsung charging port so I can charge my Galaxy S5 if you were so inclined.
customer_reviews.author: CoryGunz

customer_reviews.title: Really good drive
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this purchase. This drive is very fast and light weight, and it is excellent to compensate for the small drive in my MacBook Air. I would have gotten the 500 Gb version if I could afford it, as in these days 250 Gb is not as good as it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: CGDM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast and super small. I have been putting MP4 video files on it, then pluging it into my tv. Files play great. This drive fits in the palm of my hand. It's a little pricy, but that's because ssd (solid state drives) are relatively new. I'm waiting for the price to drop before getting the 1tb version.
customer_reviews.author: oFFCeNTauR

customer_reviews.title: 8GB RAM-upgraded to Win 10) but after this was done all is fine after several weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: Works well. It took a bit of 'juggling' around the PW questions to get it implemented on a Win10 Professional PC (5 year old PC-3.33GHz Intel dual core, separate graphics processor, 8GB RAM-upgraded to Win 10) but after this was done all is fine after several weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: It was a hassle to connect this SSD to my ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a hassle to connect this SSD to my Ubuntu machine. Just a 100MB was recognized when connected. I decided to return it since for that price I want it to work out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: odessit

customer_reviews.title: wonderful, fast
customer_reviews.text: would not be recognized on win 10 until I setup on windows 7 machine and used no password. Then I used on windows 10 machine no problem. Then I used on mac air, no problem. wonderful, fast, small, light, just what I needed. very easy to carry around
customer_reviews.author: Voo

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Compact Drive
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat, tidy little hard drive. The included USB cable is only about 4" long, so you should know that it will be kept very close to your computer. Be sure to use the set-up utility that is included on the drive. Without doing that, it will only show half the available space (security programming) and won't be usable. Once you run the set-up utility, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my 15" MacBook Pro WR
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my 15" MacBook Pro WR. Use it to store all my virtual machines (Windows 7, Windows 10 Preview and Fedora Linux) that I run under Parallels. It's small and light and pretty zippy for a USB 3 device.
customer_reviews.author: Carmine Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy...especially for Lightroom users.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by just how much faster this is than an external USB 3 drive. It makes working on files stored externally in Lightroom just as fast as files stored on the computer. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ingraham

customer_reviews.title: usb 3 flakes, then dies
customer_reviews.text: The usb 3 dual micro plug stopped working after a week; using standard usb 2 micro plugs is perfect tho. Should've returned it when i noticed the problem but it was a busy time.
customer_reviews.author: Unarmed Apple Purveyor

customer_reviews.title: This is so much faster than my ephd but ill ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so much faster than my ephd but ill have to buy another as i need at least 500gb because i work in the IT field, but with every memory you should always get 2 backs ups of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Purchasing Maniac

customer_reviews.title: So far works great. No issue
customer_reviews.text: So far works great. No issue. I bought to replace my standard P hard drive. Has password feature and I think you need it if keeping important files.
customer_reviews.author: I M khan

customer_reviews.title: Small flash drive in a fancy case
customer_reviews.text: Nice drive, small like advertised. Annoying security software. Don't buy if you are wanting to use it on multiple computers. Otherwise it's just a small flash drive in a fancy case.
customer_reviews.author: King.Colt

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this external drive
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this external drive. I love it so much I plan to buy the newer 500 GB model, It is simple, efficient and fast
customer_reviews.author: Ashiata Shiemash

customer_reviews.title: Future of mobile drives
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device, unfortunately you need to run the software to initialise it BUT don't worry this works on all my devices I've tested on without the software; like a regular drive. Pros: Very small, extremely fast, very light + I actually like the small cable, no idea why you'd want a long cable this is very neat for carrying around and since it's an ssd it's not going to sustain fall damage like a hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Should be standard equipment.
customer_reviews.text: A year later, it's working perfectly, what more can you ask for? Great light weight compact design, however I don't move it as much as I thought I would. When can I get a 4TB one?
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gotch

customer_reviews.title: needed a drive to run a virtual machine on and this is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: wow caused my productivity to jump. needed a drive to run a virtual machine on and this is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel L. Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Very secure
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that you can encrypt the drive itself and it works great, I have tested to see if I can get to the folders without the software and password and you cannot. Its very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Faulty USB connections caused system crashes.
customer_reviews.text: 2 of 3 of these ordered stopped working within a year. Faulty USB connections in both cases, which also caused random MacOS crashing/kernel panics. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G. J. Generelli

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: Really fast and really tiny. A little smaller than the size of a playing card. Just plug and play and start moving or copying files.
customer_reviews.author: amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Get it worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Totally love this thing. Its sooo fast don't ever worry about working straight off of it to load and open files on schools slow computer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Drive, But Watch Out for the Copy Protection
customer_reviews.text: Good drive once you figure out how to permanently get rid of the absurd copy protection. Security overkill by Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Beacham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What is there not to like! Good capacity in tiny size. Did I say it is very fast?
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Ekin

customer_reviews.title: Works great and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller drive than I was expecting. Works great and very easy to use, however the usb cord is very short if that is any issue for your specific use.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie F

customer_reviews.title: Super fast and super slim
customer_reviews.text: Use it for my xbox 1 and all my other devices. Super fast and super slim. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Dang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it on an iMac and it's really fast an small. I'm getting +400MB/s
customer_reviews.author: Dan Navgom

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Superb solid state drive, fast and very small footprint. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dog owner

customer_reviews.title: It is fast and easy!
customer_reviews.text: I run Windows applications off this drive through Parallels for Mac OS X. It is fast and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a while. only problem is that its wire is very short.
customer_reviews.author: Karan P.

customer_reviews.title: Great SSD, Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: Great SSD, although there is the newer T3 released with a better case design, you can't go past this if you want to save some coin. Although I should have ordered a travel case for it at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Vreugdenburg

customer_reviews.title: ... a little high on these but they do work great.
customer_reviews.text: The price is a little high on these but they do work great.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, very quick transfer, light and functional *fingers crossed for longevity*
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Bought the 250GB version for $85 and with international shipping ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 250GB version for $85 and with international shipping $95.23. Totally worth it. Very speedy and ultra-compact. One issue i have is that every PC i use it in, I have to install a software (one time install) otherwise the drive doesn't work. I wish it wasn't the case and it was just plug and play from the first go.
customer_reviews.author: Shakif Chowdhury

customer_reviews.title: Great storage product
customer_reviews.text: Compact and lightweight. Works well and setup was easy. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: NSquare

customer_reviews.title: A good backup drive
customer_reviews.text: I am currently using this product as a backup for my computer files. Based off of my use, this appears to be a quality drive that is not slow. Would recommend this product to family or friends.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is small and super fast. It is the fastest portable drive that I have ever seen. At regular USB3.0 read/write @ ~300 MB/s, and when enable UASP function, it increased to ~420 MB/s.
customer_reviews.author: Yuchen Zhang

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up silent
customer_reviews.text: Main drive for my iMac, fast,easy to set up silent.
customer_reviews.author: Charlemagne

customer_reviews.title: The form factor is great and the device is remarkably fast
customer_reviews.text: The form factor is great and the device is remarkably fast. However, it is outrageous and unacceptable that you have to install a kernel-level device driver for a simple hard drive. Would be five stars were it not for this very shady decision by Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Schooler

customer_reviews.title: Wickedly fast SSD
customer_reviews.text: Wickedly fast. Amazed by the speed. Got a very good deal on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Nikonlensman

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: works great we were shocked at how small it was like 1 1/2 in
customer_reviews.author: David Reiff

customer_reviews.title: small, compact and fast.
customer_reviews.text: small, compact and fast. Since it is a SSD then it is rugged
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: while the form its nice, which is good for someone interested in carry it in your pocket, its not as fast as samsung evo 850
customer_reviews.text: while the form its nice, which is good for someone interested in carry it in your pocket, its not as fast as having a samsung evo 850 with a cable to usb... and then you can still connect the evo 850 to your computer using the x-dock port or the sata port if needed to obtain the fastest speed possible... a usb 3.0 is good for the road, but no the best if you are finally in your home. size wise, its smaller than an 850, but both fit a pocket without problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! It works as if it is installed in my computers!
customer_reviews.author: Richard T Wilkins Jr

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you remember your password. If you shut down your computer, or it goes to sleep for a few hours, you must re-sign into the drive to gain access.
customer_reviews.author: terrance465

customer_reviews.title: So it is very useful in any environment
customer_reviews.text: It is portable. So it is very useful in any environment.
customer_reviews.author: YOUNG KIM

customer_reviews.title: I'm seeing five stars.
customer_reviews.text: I plugged this into my Sony Blu-Ray Player, Xbox 360 and PC. It worked on all of those and I installed Team Fortress 2 on it and it had no problems playing it. A very good second drive for me.
customer_reviews.author: TheReviewster

customer_reviews.title: For the moment is working without a hitch. It's ...
customer_reviews.text: For the moment is working without a hitch. It's very fast too. I'm using it on a Macbook Pro to run a Windows partition.
customer_reviews.author: JAN C LUBECK

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage and Speed
customer_reviews.text: Small, feather-light, very convenient. Great read/write speeds. Love the password protection, too. I have to keep reminding myself that this is an external hard drive and not an oversize flash drive.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: To buy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, very compact and fast device. Much better than any pendrive
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Antunez

customer_reviews.title: Disconnects and multiple problems
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these and after multiple problems with connections I'm done. The drive would suddenly disconnect from the computer and not be there on the Windows Explorer view. Time and time again this would happen and would happen on different computers. I love other Samsung products, but not this one. * I called support, but very slow and unresponsive. I don't have all day to talk to wait to talk with someone, then be told they have to transfer me, and then do that all over again. No one wants to help.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Fast 250GB SSD.
customer_reviews.text: So far this ssd has not skipped a beat. I'm getting the read/write speeds that are advertised. The included security feature is handy, but if you don't need it you're better off formatting the drive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Installed this on my iMac that has an internal 1tb ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on my iMac that has an internal 1tb hd to see if it would speed it up and it is crazy fast now as my main boot drive.
customer_reviews.author: Alan R. Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Samsung T1 Portable 250GB USB 3.0
customer_reviews.text: Great little hard drive l am transferring files at around 300 MB/s.Drive gets warm but not hot to touch.Overall l am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: casper68

customer_reviews.title: This product is great, I run virtual machines on the disk
customer_reviews.text: This product is great ,I run virtual machines on the disk, and it has nearly the same speed as the SSD I installed inside my laptop,which is Samsung Evo850. It really helped free my system disk .
customer_reviews.author: XieDi

customer_reviews.title: Great and the cable is short for a reason you ...
customer_reviews.text: Great and the cable is short for a reason you travel with in and don't ned to drag along a long cable
customer_reviews.author: hyaz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ive been waiting on this for years it seems like.
customer_reviews.author: Gamer-X

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: But why did they made a cable 10 cm long? Its better no cable or longer one
customer_reviews.author: Pavel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Performance for Next-Gen Consoles
customer_reviews.text: Noticeably improves load times--10-15 seconds. Be sure to set up the device on a computer first before connecting to your Xbox One or PS4.
customer_reviews.author: David R Claycomb

customer_reviews.title: All round speed
customer_reviews.text: Super fast. Super light. Super portable. The cable could be a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Windybank

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected and does a good job storing what does not fit on my primary ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected and does a good job storing what does not fit on my primary hard drive. The encryption feature is poorly implemented. The disk will remain mounted but unusable after my laptop comes out of hibernation.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I love it, makes games load much faster and it's a great price for what you're getting.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and fast
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and fast, the only thing is that i had to unlock it first on my pc to use it on mac,
customer_reviews.author: Shake

customer_reviews.title: I recommend that product to everyone
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. So small and so fast! The decryption is very fast. I recommend that product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent drive.  Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Started right up without a problem. Noticeably very fast.. Wel worth the money
customer_reviews.author: The Trucker

customer_reviews.title: The transfer rate on this SSD is amazing. It is small lightweight and I can put ...
customer_reviews.text: The transfer rate on this SSD is amazing. It is small lightweight and I can put it in my pocket and carry it with me anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Wixsten

customer_reviews.title: Not a true plug-and-play external drive.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Immediately plugging in to my Mac -- a work machine, on which I have no admin rights -- I was prompted for an installation of a driver (installation of which required admin rights) before the drive would function. With that logic, this drive is not truly portable unless you're able to install a driver on every machine you intend to you use it. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the reviews
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews say it doesn't support TRIM. Windows disagrees - TRIM works just fine. Fast, sleek, wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Simon W Allen

customer_reviews.title: Totally terrible for mac users
customer_reviews.text: Totally terrible for mac users. Must install their software drivers to be able to format it. In fact you can only see a tiny partition on it until you do. Once you get access to see it an format it with Disk Utility you no longer need the drivers... but there is no uninstaller
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rountree

customer_reviews.title: fast easy to carry small size
customer_reviews.text: Its the right one, fast easy to carry small size, its still the first batch sot its Made in Korea not china, If you guys dont care about reading/writing speed or if you aint entered to the world of SSD yet there is other product cheaper and bigger capacity
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on Lenovo with XP
customer_reviews.text: My Lenovo T61 laptop with Windows XP would not recognize this drive at all, after multiple attempts. The instructions say it needs Windows 7 or above, but the product description does not. Returning for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: compact and great for storage while on the go with my tablet. - fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Be All Inclusive

customer_reviews.title: Be careful: Drive might not actually save your files
customer_reviews.text: I would give it no stars if possible. I saved a document to the hard drive and the document is no where to be found. Unlike other hard drives you have to install this drive and, apparently, if you do not it will not save files... despite it letting you save the files. I will be returning the product and would like the ten hours of my life back that were wasted because of this irritatingly difficult to use pos.
customer_reviews.author: first_time_mom

customer_reviews.title: USB 3 issue very important
customer_reviews.text: A word of caution. If you are not careful and plug into a USB 2 connection, not only it will not work but that it Windows will ask for it to be formatted. If you press the format option, then not only the installed files are lost but it will not format. The drive then becomes unusable as to restore it you will have to send it to the manufacturer or call the support for suggestions. READ THE MANUAL before any doing anyting.
customer_reviews.author: M. Yousuf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great SSD, easy to set up, and very fast! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Achim Runnebaum

customer_reviews.title: Not Plug in Play and Useless Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: First I tried to use it like it was plug in play. Said it only had 125MB and didn't work. Then read the instructions. Installed their samsung program and configured the drive. Then the drive does not appear in my File Explorer. Rebooted, tried other computers. Same thing. Read the other reviews on here for tips. Concluded I have to call 1-800-Samsung to get anywhere. I did. I got a busy signal. Read some other reviews in the meantime of people who got through to Samsung and found out Samsung wasted a lot of time only to be told "go exchange it" at the end. This experience has sworn me off all Samsung products. I'm Korean too. WTH.
customer_reviews.author: Engimom

customer_reviews.title: Good for engineers and computers geeks
customer_reviews.text: Not Mac friendly. Does not work well with USB 2 systems. Good for engineers and computers geeks, not for mere mortals.
customer_reviews.author: calmaniac

customer_reviews.title: Window 7 Fast Jump Drive
customer_reviews.text: I did NOT notice that it like Windows 7 and not XP. I had to upgrade my home computer to use it. Fast, fast, fast. Still a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Modog

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Awesome...Fast... Small. Smaller than a credit card and much faster than USB thumbdrives.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Mann

customer_reviews.title: I got one and after 6 months I lost all ...
customer_reviews.text: I got one and after 6 months I lost all my data. My pc does not recognize it. I called Samsung no help, no refund, no replacement. They asked me to take to communicate with Amazon. Amazon policy is very clear, one month. The product is less than one year, it should be under warranty. However, I found that Samsung does not support their product. Be careful when you buy Samsung product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect very often.
customer_reviews.text: The T1 won't connect and has connection issues. I have most luck with the device when I play a balancing game to get the T1 exactly flush with the wire and connector. The drive is great - when it works. I am buying a replacement wire in hopes that the fault is with the wire but I think it's the device itself.
customer_reviews.author: Mei Ke

customer_reviews.title: It's great.
customer_reviews.text: It's small, and fast. I use it every day. You really need a 3.0 USB for this drive. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Stop working in less than a week and since I ...
customer_reviews.text: Stop working in less than a week and since I live in the Caribbean I could not return it within the 30 return period.
customer_reviews.author: J. Raynold Arthurton

customer_reviews.title: Bad thing is trying to find the configuration software when ...
customer_reviews.text: As usual ssd hard drives are fast at data transfer. Bad thing is trying to find the configuration software when you switch computers
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

product_meta.title: [DISCONTINUED] Samsung T1 Portable 250GB USB 3.0 External SSD (MU-PS250B/AM)
product_meta.description: The powerful performance of an internal SSD with cutting edge security in a compact, stylish case.
feature_bullets: Super fast read-write speeds of up to 450 MB/s driven by Turbo Write Technology.
Easy Password Protection - Embedded AES 256 bit encryption for cutting edge data security
Slim compact shape, combining style and portability featuring laser patterning and black chrome metalized finish
Small and sleek up to 1TB storage, but weighs only 1 Oz.
Supports USB 3.0 Interface Up to 10X Faster than USB 2.0
